# Feeltracker

> AI-powered health and wellness tracking applications for iOS. Suite of 5 apps: Blood Pressure, Daily Journal, Mental Health, Sleep & Dreams, and Weight & Food.

Feeltracker is developed by Custom Arts. All apps are free with optional premium AI features, available on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Privacy-first: health data stays on-device and in iCloud — never accessed or sold.

## Apps

- [Blood Pressure Tracker](https://feeltracker.com/blood-pressure/): #1 blood pressure app in the UK. Track systolic, diastolic, pulse, and MAP. Camera Scan AI reads values from monitor screens. Integrates with Apple Health, OMRON, Microlife, Beurer. Export PDF/Excel reports for doctors.
- [Daily Journal](https://feeltracker.com/daily-journal/): Write daily reflections, track life events, and discover patterns. AI sentiment analysis, word frequency tracking, and photo attachments. Apple Health integration.
- [Mental Health Tracker](https://feeltracker.com/mental-health/): Monitor mood with daily ratings and notes. Identify triggers and patterns with AI analysis. Supports bipolar, DBT, CBT, ADHD tracking. iOS 18+ Mental Health integration with Apple Health.
- [Sleep & Dreams Tracker](https://feeltracker.com/sleep/): Log sleep/wake times, track dreams, monitor sleep quality. AI-powered pattern detection for sleep factors. Apple Health sleep data integration.
- [Weight & Food Tracker](https://feeltracker.com/weight/): Track weight, body fat %, BMI, and food intake. Camera Scan AI for scale readings. Monthly averages, AI insights, Apple Health sync.

## Key Features (All Apps)

- Camera Scan AI: automatically capture readings from device screens
- AI-powered insights and pattern detection
- Apple Health bidirectional sync
- iCloud backup and sync across devices
- Export to PDF, Excel, CSV for sharing with healthcare providers
- 33 language support
- No ads, no tracking, privacy-first design

## Languages

Available in English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, Русский, 日本語, 한국어, and Português (Brasil):

- English: https://feeltracker.com/
- Deutsch: https://feeltracker.com/de/
- Español: https://feeltracker.com/es/
- Français: https://feeltracker.com/fr/
- Italiano: https://feeltracker.com/it/
- Русский: https://feeltracker.com/ru/
- 日本語: https://feeltracker.com/ja/
- 한국어: https://feeltracker.com/ko/
- Português (Brasil): https://feeltracker.com/pt-br/
